sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of UnitedHealth Group ( UNH ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.9%.
Year to date, UnitedHealth Group registers a 12.1% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.2%.
Home Depot is lower by about 3.5% looking at the year to date performance.
One other component making a move today is JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading up 1.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
